about_the_game:
Introducing the awaited KADOKAWA official resource series from the RPG Maker MV developer team! The first Japanese trilogy is packed with sounds and tilesets to express themes of "light" "darkness" and "twilight" in a Japanese flavor. These resources are suitable not only for Japanese RPGs but also just right to present a cyber appearance. Also, as a special perk for buying, we've resized battler data from XP to fit MV and included several pieces in each package.

Materials included in Japanese Resource Pack No.1-1 "Festival of Light"

- BGM
Main Theme / Field 1 /Field 2 / Field 3 /Victory Theme 1
Victory Theme 2 /Festival 1 / Festival 2 /Peaceful Moment / Setting Out

- BGS
Festival 1 / Festival 2 / Festival 3 /Festival 4
Festival 5 / Festival 6 / Festival 7 /Festival 8

- ME
Battle Victory Jingle 1 / Battle Victory Jingle 2 /Get Item 1
Get Item 2 / Mission Accomplished

- SE
Lantern 1 / Lantern 2 / Windmill / Festival Float 1 / Festival Float 2 /Festival Float 3
Mirror 1 / Mirror 2 / Ascent / Electric Light Monitor / Neon Tube / Vending Machine

- Tilesets
Festival Stall, Portable Shrine, Paper Lantern, Neon Street Signs, etc

- Bonus: RPG Maker XP Battler Data
Fighter07 / Cleric03 / Beast03 /Angel04 / Elemental01


Sample (SoundCloud)


* This resource pack is one part of a trilogy of Japanese resources. You can check out other two packs below
detailed_description:
Introducing the awaited KADOKAWA official resource series from the RPG Maker MV developer team! The first Japanese trilogy is packed with sounds and tilesets to express themes of "light" "darkness" and "twilight" in a Japanese flavor. These resources are suitable not only for Japanese RPGs but also just right to present a cyber appearance. Also, as a special perk for buying, we've resized battler data from XP to fit MV and included several pieces in each package.

Materials included in Japanese Resource Pack No.1-1 "Festival of Light"

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

name: RPG Maker MV - Festival of Light: Japanese Resource Pack

package_groups.name: default

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

short_description: Introducing the awaited KADOKAWA official resource series from the RPG Maker MV developer team! The first Japanese trilogy is packed with sounds and tilesets to express themes of "light" "darkness" and "twilight" in a Japanese flavor.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese
